summary: After firing a colleague, the head of a PR company begins to question her lifestyle and values.
cast: Li-Mei Chen|Shiang-chyi Chen|Yi-wen Chen|Danny Deng|Kuei-Ying Hsu|Hung Hung|Elaine Jin|Richie Li|Shu-Chun Ni|Bosen Wang|Wei-Ming Wang|Ye-Ming Wang|Chi-Tung Yu|Mei-Yun Yu
title: Du li shi dai
